Package xxl.indexStructures

Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.

Interface Summary
Tree.Descriptor The Descriptor describes the region represented by a given subtree.

Tree The Tree-class is a generic and highly flexible super-class that implements features used by grow and post-trees.
 

Package xxl.indexStructures Description

Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
Author: Jochen van den Bercken
